Quote.Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote.QuoteValue: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change

Quote.Author: Stephen King
Quote.QuoteValue: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool

Quote.Author: Steve Jobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people

Quote.Author: Steven Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I think of the past, it brings back so many memories

Quote.Author: Sun Tzu
Quote.QuoteValue: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting

Quote.Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote.QuoteValue: Kiss me and you will see how important I am

Quote.Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote.QuoteValue: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go

Quote.Author: Taylor Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't need to share the same opinions as others, but we need to be respectful

Quote.Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground

Quote.Author: Thich Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful

Quote.Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote.QuoteValue: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work

Quote.Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship

Quote.Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote.QuoteValue: He who has health, has hope; and he who has hope, has everything

Quote.Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is unconditional love

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: Youth is something I never wanna take for granted. I just want to smile and live life

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no black-and-white situation. It's all part of life. Highs, lows, middles

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: To love another person is to see the face of God

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in the tough times, He's still a good God

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: Challenging the meaning of life is the truest expression of the state of being human

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as you live keep smiling because it brightens everybody's day

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortune favours the bold

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: A lie told often enough becomes the truth

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: The breaking of a wave cannot explain the whole sea

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it is necessary to be lonely in order to prove that you are right

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: Start every day off with a smile and get it over with

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: Education must not simply teach work - it must teach Life

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: A bad system will beat a good person every time

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can dream it, you can do it

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is something you can't wear out

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: I see myself as sexy. If you are comfortable with it, it can be very classy and appealing

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: Be honest, be nice, be a flower not a weed

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: Decisions are made by those who show up

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Sacred cows make the tastiest hamburger

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the thing about making a movie: You never finish editing. They just take it away from you

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest truth is honesty, and the greatest falsehood is dishonesty

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm into heavy duty, psychedelic, foreign music. That's what I like listening to

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: Achievement results from work realizing ambition

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: My first car was a motorcycle

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to kill that father-son bond

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: I am gay, and I'm very comfortable with it

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: Biceps for show, triceps for go

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: My comedy is different every time I do it. I don't know what the hell I'm doing

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is always an option

Quote.Author: Adam Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The real tragedy of the poor is the poverty of their aspirations

Quote.Author: Adam West
Quote.QuoteValue: When you wear a mask and create a character, nothing will pigeonhole you faster

Quote.Author: Adele
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't make music for eyes. I make music for ears

Quote.Author: Adlai E. Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to lead a cavalry charge if you think you look funny on a horse

Quote.Author: Adrienne Rich
Quote.QuoteValue: Lying is done with words and also with silence

Quote.Author: Aesop
Quote.QuoteValue: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted

Quote.Author: Agatha Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the luckiest things that can happen to you in life is, I think, to have a happy childhood

Quote.Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote.QuoteValue: True beauty is when someone radiates that they like themselves

Quote.Author: Aisha Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure

Quote.Author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: My family is my strength and my weakness

Quote.Author: Al Franken
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is more sensitive to the issue of overeating than the creator of Stuart Smalley

Quote.Author: Al Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the cost of energy will come down when we make this transition to renewable energy

Quote.Author: Al Pacino
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to fool the eye but it's hard to fool the heart

Quote.Author: Al Yankovic
Quote.QuoteValue: My personal taste doesn't enter into it a lot when I make my decisions as to what to parody

Quote.Author: Alain de Botton
Quote.QuoteValue: What is fascinating about marriage is why anyone wants to get married

Quote.Author: Alan Alda
Quote.QuoteValue: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been

Quote.Author: Alan Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Your whole life is on the other side of the glass. And there is nobody watching

Quote.Author: Alan Furst
Quote.QuoteValue: When you move a border, suddenly life changes violently. I write about nationality

Quote.Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote.QuoteValue: Protectionism will do little to create jobs and if foreigners retaliate, we will surely lose jobs

Quote.Author: Alan Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't leave home without your sword - your intellect

Quote.Author: Alan Rickman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a lot less serious than people think

Quote.Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote.QuoteValue: Your political views really denote your spiritual views

Quote.Author: Albert Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: You largely constructed your depression. It wasn't given to you. Therefore, you can deconstruct it

Quote.Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others

Quote.Author: Alec Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember, sex is like a Chinese dinner. It ain't over 'til you both get your cookie

Quote.Author: Aleister Crowley
Quote.QuoteValue: Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the law

Quote.Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinema is universal, beyond flags and borders and passports

Quote.Author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
Quote.QuoteValue: People say I am mad. I am not mad. I am trying to heal my soul

Quote.Author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
Quote.QuoteValue: The battleline between good and evil runs through the heart of every man

Quote.Author: Alessia Cara
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I sing, it it's a reminder to myself that I have to be confident

Quote.Author: Alex Berenson
Quote.QuoteValue: If only the human body could handle trauma as well as biotechnology stocks do

Quote.Author: Alex Rodriguez
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't see the light. Where is the light? What am I in this for?

Quote.Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion should be a form of escapism, and not a form of imprisonment

Quote.Author: Alexander Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves

Quote.Author: Alexander the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion

Quote.Author: Alexandra Daddario
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a combination between extreme insecurity and extreme confidence

Quote.Author: Alexei Sayle
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't do comedy with a beard

Quote.Author: Alexis de Tocqueville
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many men of principle in both parties in America, but there is no party of principle

Quote.Author: Alfred Adler
Quote.QuoteValue: My difficulties belong to me!

Quote.Author: Alfred Hitchcock
Quote.QuoteValue: Revenge is sweet and not fattening

Quote.Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all

Quote.Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change and to preserve change amid order

Quote.Author: Alice Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: The two most joyous times of the year are Christmas morning and the end of school

Quote.Author: Alice Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: In search of my mother's garden, I found my own

Quote.Author: Alice Waters
Quote.QuoteValue: The decisions you make are a choice of values that reflect your life in every way

Quote.Author: Alicia Keys
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom is definitely my rock

Quote.Author: Alison Krauss
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh Mr. Webster could never define what's being said between your heart and mine

Quote.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness

Quote.Author: Allen Iverson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're from Virginia, then you know some white people from Poquoson don't like black people

Quote.Author: Allison Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom has beautiful eyes, and I inherited a lot of her rituals, accentuating eyes

Quote.Author: Alvin Toffler
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest tragedy I had was the loss of my daughter from neuromuscular disease in 2000, at age 46

Quote.Author: Ambrose Bierce
Quote.QuoteValue: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her

Quote.Author: Amelia Earhart
Quote.QuoteValue: The most effective way to do it, is to do it

Quote.Author: Amiri Baraka
Quote.QuoteValue: God has been replaced, as he has all over the West, with respectability and air conditioning

Quote.Author: Amitabh Bachchan
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a blur when one is essaying different roles; it is so fulfilling

Quote.Author: Amy Winehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: Every bad situation is a blues song waiting to happen

Quote.Author: Anatole France
Quote.QuoteValue: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads

Quote.Author: Andie MacDowell
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexiness comes with maturity

Quote.Author: Andre Gide
Quote.QuoteValue: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore

Quote.Author: Andre Maurois
Quote.QuoteValue: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short

Quote.Author: Andrea Bocelli
Quote.QuoteValue: All that counts in life is intention

Quote.Author: Andrew Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit for doing it

Quote.Author: Andrew Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no pleasure in having nothing to do; the fun is having lots to do and not doing it

Quote.Author: Andrew Lloyd Webber
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got to find something and if I find something that I like, I'll do it. If I don't, I won't

Quote.Author: Andy Cohen
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet is for haters. Everyone wants to knock somebody down, but it's cool

Quote.Author: Andy Goldsworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Snow provokes responses that reach right back to childhood

Quote.Author: Andy Grove
Quote.QuoteValue: Success breeds complacency. Complacency breeds failure. Only the paranoid survive

Quote.Author: Andy Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm in Miami I like to go and watch basketball, the Miami Heat

Quote.Author: Andy Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: All men are not created equal but should be treated as though they were under the law

Quote.Author: Andy Serkis
Quote.QuoteValue: Be magnificent. Life's short. Get out there. You can do it. Everyone can do it. Everyone

Quote.Author: Angela Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: What this country needs is more unemployed politicians

Quote.Author: Angela Merkel
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to human dignity, we cannot make compromises

Quote.Author: Angelina Jolie
Quote.QuoteValue: Where ever I am I always find myself looking out the window wishing I was somewhere else

Quote.Author: Ani DiFranco
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care if they eat me alive, I've got better things to do then survive

Quote.Author: Ann Coulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to engage in repartee with people who are stupider than I am

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: Teaching was the hardest work I had ever done, and it remains the hardest work I have done to date

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Learning is a tunnel experience that makes us think more broadly

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: My family has had to become quite understanding about me not returning phone calls when I'm filming

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfectionism is the voice of the oppressor

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel we are all islands - in a common sea

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: The only pain in pleasure is the pleasure of the pain

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to change; I'm very stubborn in this way. I am what I am

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a muscular energy in sunlight corresponding to the spiritual energy of wind

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: A thing that you see in my pictures is that I was not afraid to fall in love with these people

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: Dying is easy, it's living that scares me to death

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: There are always two people in every picture: the photographer and the viewer

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: Barbecue may not be the road to world peace, but it's a start

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's too short to deal with other people's insecurities

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: What I've realized over the years is that I have some pretty good friends

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: My sweetheart is to me more than a coined hemisphere

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: The court makes an amazing amount of decisions that ought to be made by the people

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything changes as you get older - your mind, your body, the way you view the world

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Every birthday is a gift. Every day is a gift

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't ever doubt yourselves or waste a second of your life. It's too short, and you're too special

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a friend of Colin Powell. We talk quite often

Quote.Author: Aristophanes
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot teach a crab to walk straight

Quote.Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote.QuoteValue: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down

Quote.Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The road to success is always under construction

Quote.Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do not believe you can do it then you have no chance at all

Quote.Author: Art Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to go to Iceland to see the northern lights

Quote.Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome

Quote.Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible

Quote.Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data

Quote.Author: Arthur Koestler
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more sad than the death of an illusion

Quote.Author: Arthur Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: The theater is so endlessly fascinating because it's so accidental. It's so much like life

Quote.Author: ASAP Ferg
Quote.QuoteValue: I create art. It's kinda abstract

Quote.Author: ASAP Rocky
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a gangster, bro

Quote.Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote.QuoteValue: I could never be with a woman who felt like she needs to change me

Quote.Author: Audre Lorde
Quote.QuoteValue: The master's tools will never dismantle the master's house

Quote.Author: August Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: As soon as white folks say a play's good, the theater is jammed with blacks and whites

Quote.Author: Aung San Suu Kyi
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to bring an end to long-standing conflict, you have to be prepared to compromise

Quote.Author: Ava DuVernay
Quote.QuoteValue: If your dream is only about you, it's too small

Quote.Author: Avril Lavigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life

Quote.Author: Ayrton Senna
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no idols. I admire work, dedication and competence

Quote.Author: Azim Premji
Quote.QuoteValue: People are the key to success or extraordinary success

Quote.Author: Aziz Ansari
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people my age think stand up sucks

Quote.Author: Azzedine Alaia
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion will last forever. It will exist always. It will exist in its own way in each era

Quote.Author: B. B. King
Quote.QuoteValue: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you

Quote.Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is the meat of life, pleasure the dessert

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: You just can't beat the person who never gives up

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: A beautiful woman should break her mirror early

Quote.Author: Ban Ki-moon
Quote.QuoteValue: Terrorism is a significant threat to peace and security, prosperity and people

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: Being brave enough to just be unapologetic for who you are, that's a goddess

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: What the people want is very simple - they want an America as good as its promise

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: I can take any truth; just don't lie to me

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm antisocial - there's no question about it

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what my future is

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be straight to be in the military; you just have to be able to shoot straight

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: The beauty of diversification is it's about as close as you can get to a free lunch in investing

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: As the facts change, change your thesis. Don't be a stubborn mule, or you'll get killed

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: When I saw corruption, I was forced to find truth on my own. I couldn't swallow the hypocrisy

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: As militias go, the Ohio Defense Force is on the moderate side

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want the present to be different from the past, study the past

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: If Paris is a city of lights, Sydney is the city of fireworks

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: As a young boy, scouting gave me a confidence and camaraderie that is hard to find in modern life

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to sell my finest pieces

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: What is the cruelest thing you can do to someone who is trying to concentrate? Call their name

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: People, chained by monotony, afraid to think, clinging to certainties... they live like ants

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: I think life experiences are different for people who know what they want as children

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely gain weight, and I'm not naturally thin

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't try to impress people. Always be yourself!

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I find forgiveness to be really healthy

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in that kind of pragmatic career ladder stuff

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: How much would you pay to avoid a second Depression?

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really looking forward to, not more of the same, but a continual growth

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Often any decision, even the wrong decision, is better than no decision

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: True happiness consists not in the multitude of friends, but in the worth and choice

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: If your best friend has stolen your girlfriend, it does become life and death

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: Magic becomes art when it has nothing to hide

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Every soul deserves a shot at a Cadillac, but not everyone should be guaranteed a Cadillac

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: Each new day has a different shape to it. You just roll with it

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoy the journey of life and not just the endgame

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: With proper governance, life will improve for all

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: It's good to trust others but, not to do so is much better

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: Some will criticize me no matter what I do

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: But this is not to say that the society which inflicts capital punishment commits murder

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you know that every unbeliever is filled with a demon spirit?

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: It's never too late to have a happy childhood

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: If you choose to take a path in life, don't blame other people for the path you've chosen to take

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't build myself by beating somebody down

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal of real healthcare reform must be high-quality, universal coverage in a cost-effective way

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: Because things are the way they are, things will not stay the way they are

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd luv to kiss ya, but I just washed my hair

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: You can always tell about somebody by the way they put their hands on an animal

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't start out writing to give children hope, but I'm glad some of them found it

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel great identification with the developing world

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: I think gold is made for kings and pharaohs - that's what I am

Quote.Author: Bikram Choudhury
Quote.QuoteValue: You go to Starbucks, and you know what you're going to get. It's the same with my yoga
